{"step_by_step_thinking": "The RSC (Remodel the Structure of Chromatin) complex is a chromatin remodeling complex that is known to interact with nucleosomes, the basic unit of DNA packaging. H2A.Z is a variant of the histone H2A, which is a component of the nucleosome. There are studies that suggest that the RSC complex can target and interact with H2A.Z nucleosomes.", "answer_choice": "A. yes"}
